person.persName: Willa Janes Viley (George Washington Johnson's father-in-law)

body.p: Residence: Scott County, Kentucky. A wealthy Maryland-born farmer. Married Lydia Smith. Father of Ann Eliza Viley, who married Kentucky Provisional Governor George Washington Johnson.
